item.title: EP 193 - The Nightman Cometh: The Evil Of The Pombero
item.itunes:title: The Nightman Cometh: The Evil Of The Pombero
item.description:
Today we look at a conspiracy only a few hours old, investigate an 18 year long murder mystery, and then we break out the rum and cigars as we face down the Pombero!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

33 46 47 58 62 67 74 118 137 187 228 | Murder of Nipsey Hussle, March 31, 2019, at his 'store' +Nipsey Russel, Lauren London & Dr. Sebi

http://freetofindtruth.blogspot.com/2019/03/62-67-137-228-murder-of-nipsey-hussle.html

 

Murder of Jerry Michael Williams

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murder_of_Jerry_Michael_Williams

 

Denise Williams trial: Brian Winchester testifies affair 'snowballed' into plot to kill

https://www.tallahassee.com/story/news/2018/12/11/mike-williams-murder-denise-trial-brian-winchester-tallahassee-disappearance-affair-plot/2278989002/

 

'My son's horrific death demands justice': Denise Williams sentenced to life in prison

https://www.tallahassee.com/story/news/2019/02/06/denise-williams-sentenced-life-prison-murder-her-husband/2787300002/

 

Pombero

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1XvSSZyB4uA

 

Pombero

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pombero

 

The Nightman

https://itsalwayssunny.fandom.com/wiki/The_Nightman

 

The Untold Story Behind Pombero: The Most Popular Guarani Mythological Figure

https://theculturetrip.com/south-america/paraguay/articles/the-untold-story-behind-pombero-the-most-popular-guarani-mythological-figure/

 

Mysterious Evil Pombero Humanoid Spotted in Paraguay

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2018/05/mysterious-evil-pombero-humanoid-spotted-in-paraguay/

 

Kidnapped by the Pombero

http://www.strangehistory.net/2017/02/02/kidnapped-south-american-puck/

 

Yasy Yateré

https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yasy_Yater%C3%A9

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
